body:
Comment 12 by **tylerbunnell**: 
Ahh. I hadn't considered the admin rights problem.

The system could prompt the user, perhaps?

"Race detection has not been installed. If you have admin rights to the system, Go can
install race detection for you automatically. Would you like to proceed? [y/n]"

If they choose yes, it installs race detection.
If they choose no, it displays information on how to have someone with admin access
install it manually.

This approach would make it just as easy to automatically install it while also dealing
with the case where the user does not have admin rights.

I would be happy to give the auto install functionality a look and see what I can come
up with, if you guys think that is an approach you would like to take.
